prompt:
Please provide a brief summary of a well-known book you have read recently, including key themes and your overall impression.
I recently read "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald. The novel revolves around the lavish life led by millionaire Jay Gatsby, who longs for social acceptance from the upper class, symbolized by Daisy Buchanan and Tom Buchanan. Despite his attempts to gain their approval through wealth, he remains an outsider. Throughout the story, Fitzgerald uses imagery of money and green lights to emphasize Gatsby's obsession with attaining what he cannot have. The ending leaves readers wondering if Gatsby ever achieved genuine happiness or if it was all just a fantasy.
